article: A boy went to a cinema ,  bought  a ticket and went in.  _  after two or three minutes he came  _  , bought a second ticket and went in  _  After  a few  minutes he came out again and bought a third ticket. Two or three minutes  _  that he came out. The girl asked him,"  _  are you buying all the tickets? Are you  meeting  friends in the cinema all the time?" "No, I'm not doing that," answered the man, " But a big woman always stops  _  at the door and tears my ticket." Then the girl sold him  another  ticket.
